meanings.definition: A person or thing that is inserted or set in.
meanings.sent1: The new employee was an eager insetter in the team.
meanings.sent2: The key is the insetter that completes the puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The insetter walked into the wrong meeting room and caused confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was an insetter that brightened everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The insetter's smile was contagious and lifted everyone's spirits.

meanings.definition: A printed illustration or decorative design that is set into a larger page of text.
meanings.sent1: The magazine cover featured a beautiful insetter of a flower.
meanings.sent2: The book's insetter added a touch of elegance to the page.
meanings.sent3: The insetter on the poster made the text hard to read.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like an insetter, bringing life to the story.
meanings.sent5: The insetter of the butterfly captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A small piece of material that is inserted into a garment for decoration or reinforcement.
meanings.sent1: She sewed a colorful insetter onto the dress.
meanings.sent2: The insetter on the jacket added a stylish flair.
meanings.sent3: The insetter on the shirt sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: His words were like an insetter, adding strength to her resolve.
meanings.sent5: The insetter on the hat made it stand out in the crowd.
